ComicInfo.Title: Part 3 (of 4)
ComicInfo.Summary: The forces of Hell itself rally against Nancy and the feeble-spirited Lucifer! Nancy's former friends, now hell-driven, and the monstrous City of Dis stand in the way of their escape from the depths of the underworld... Dis, a city built on despair and shattered memories, ruled by the powerful Furies, Queens of Pain. And they're waiting for the runaways!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-14 09:25:29. [CVDB237228]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Antonio Vázquez, Juan Jose Ryp, Malaka Studio, Antonio Vázquez, Antonio Vázquez, Juan Jose Ryp, Juan Jose Ryp, Malaka Studio
ComicInfo.Inker: Antonio Vázquez, Juan Jose Ryp, Malaka Studio, Antonio Vázquez, Juan Jose Ryp, Malaka Studio
ComicInfo.Characters: Alecto, God, Lucifer, Megaera, Mr. Macabre, Nancy Simmons, Tisiphone
